HomePage.title: Hello world EN!
HomePage.title-section: Stablecoins, Reinvented with  Real Estate for the hospitality industry
HomePage.description-section: Convicoin combines the stability of real estate with the innovation of blockchain to offer a secure, reliable payment solution for the hospitality industry. Hotels, resorts, and restaurants can accept stablecoin payments backed by tangible property, providing businesses and guests with seamless, digital transactions rooted in real-world value.
